content: कौमार {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [कुमार-अण्] {@--1@} Juvenile, youthful, virgin, maidenly (of men and women); कौमारः पतिः, कौमारी भार्या. {@--2@} Soft, tender. {@--3@} Belonging to the god of war; <ls>Māl. 1. 1.</ls> --री {@--1@} The wife of one who has not married another wife. {@--2@} The Śakti (power) of Kārtikeya. --रं {@--1@} Childhood (to the age of five). {@--2@} Maidenhood (to the age of sixteen), virginity; पिता रक्षति कौमरे भर्ता रक्षति यौबने <ls>Ms. 9. 3</ls>; देहिनोऽस्मिन् यथा देहे कौमारं योवनं जरा <ls>Bg. 2. 13.</ls>
